column5: Enjoy the quiet of the country while only 30 minutes from Ft. Worth or Dallas. We provide concierge service with discount tickets to Six Flags, both zoos, and other tourist attractions. Relax after a busy business or vacation day with a glass of wine by the pool. Discounts offered to military members and their families. We also offer discounts for individuals visiting friends or family at Baylor Scoot & White Hospital in Waxahachie (12 minutes from home). Contact us for discount information.
column8: Relaxing Guest House close to Dallas and Ft. Worth
